text: And Joshua adjured them on that day before the Lord, saying, Cursed be the man who shall build that city: he shall lay the foundation of it in his first-born, and he shall set up the gates of it in his youngest son. And so did Hozan of BÃ¦thel; he laid the foundation in Abiron his first-born, and set up the gates of it in his youngest 6. 26 Gr. saved.surviving son.
